Validate(Network) - Static method in class railway.validation.NetValidation
Validates a network and returns an information object with results.
ValidationException - Exception in railway.validation
Simple extension of Exception to be thrown when a Network is invalid.
ValidationException(String) - Constructor for exception railway.validation.ValidationException
 
ValidationInfo - Class in railway.validation
Simple information class with boolean for whether a Network is valid or not and a list of any issues with the network.
ValidationInfo() - Constructor for class railway.validation.ValidationInfo
 
validNextRoute(Route) - Method in class railway.network.Journey
Check if the given Route would be accepted as the next Route in this Journey.

Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
